abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Third National
            Program for Community Empowerment in Rural Areas Project is
            to reduce poverty and improve local-level governance in
            Indonesia through the provision of investment resources to
            support productive proposals developed by communities, using
            a participatory planning process. Negative impacts include:
            air pollution from vehicles; flooding due to improper
            sitting of bridge; increase in airborne dust; noise
            pollution; increasing erosion; and diverting the flow of
            rain water. Mitigation measures include: 1) selecting an
            alignment that reduces environmental disturbances; 2)
            utilizing civil works and vegetative treatments to limit
            negative impacts; 3) undertaking maintenance and repairs in
            a timely fashion; 4) using vegetative treatments to
            stabilize side slopes or prevent erosion; and 5) using
            special treatments to overcome the problem of ground water,
            such as drains.
